newsitem.title: ESTONIA: ESTONIA - THREE NEW COMPANIES GET BOURSE LISTING.
newsitem.headline: ESTONIA - THREE NEW COMPANIES GET BOURSE LISTING.

text.p: The Tallinn bourse said on Tuesday that construction firm Merko, Leks Insurance and Nissan dealer Fakto will be listed on the bourse from July 22.
Shares in fish product firm Viru Rand will be traded on the free market from July 22, it added in a statement.
Merko will be the tenth company listed on the main list.
Leks Insurance, which major shares are held by Tallinna Pank , and Fakto will be listed on the secondary list.
There are four companies listed on the official list's secondary side at present.
